painting.name: An Askew Picture Frame
painting.text: There is a painting askew on the wall.

catacombs.name: An Unpredictable Stair
catacombs.text: You take a step towards the wall to straighten the painting, and the stair you are standing on gives way. You fall through what appears to be a trap door. A slide carries you all the way down into a subterranean hidden chamber. The air is strangely cool and the limestone walls are faintly green. At the end of the chamber is a fortune telling machine. It has a button. There is a door to your right.

fortune.name: The Machine
fortune.text: The machine whirs and rumbles to life. Its eyes flash. You hear a piercing voice say ”welcome, knowledge seeker, to Madame Rouge's. I will now divine your future!“ A card drops out from a slot below the machine. As you bend to pick it up, you notice the door to your right is slightly ajar.

card.name: The Card
card.text: The card simply reads ”You are going to die.“ On the other side of it is an insignia that is familiar, but something about it seems off: [TBD]. You notice a slot on the side of the machine that says ”Card Return“. The door on your right is still open.

returnCard.name: The Card Return
returnCard.text: As soon as you place the card into the slot, a door to your left opens. You stare at this symmetry of choice.
